text: Bela Vista (Portuguese for "Beautiful View") is a village in Lobata District on São Tomé Island in São Tomé and Príncipe. Its population is 527 (2012 census).2012 detailed census São Tomé e Príncipe , Instituto Nacional de Estatística It lies 0.8 km south of Santo Amaro and 5 km northwest of the capital city São Tomé. ==Population history== ==References== Category:Populated places in Lobata District
title: Bela Vista, São Tomé and Príncipe
